name: OG Memory: Synthwave Monsters
description:
OG Memory: Synthwave Monsters is an casual memory game with stunning images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

  • 12 stunning different memory cards
  • 24 memory cards in total
  • casual memory adventure
  • auto saving
  • count of ur best round
  • simple mouse control
  • 100 steam awards
